title: Classify
description: The NCAA caps sport participation at 20 hours a week in season, and 8 hours out of season. That's a joke.

title: Compensate
description: Many athletes struggle to pay rent and groceries. Pay college athletes a liveable wage for the time they spend working for their univeristy.

title: Recognize
description: Student Athletes deserve a trade union. It's time for colleges and athletic departments to recognize them as the collective bloc they are.
